sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は|↑正午|↑↓しょうご↓までにこの↑仕事↑↓しごと↓を↑終↑↓お↓わらせねばならない。
sdata.e: You have to get this work finished by noon.

sdata.e: You'll have this composition written by noon tomorrow, won't you?

sdata.j: ↑会↑↓かい↓は|↑正午|↑↓しょうご↓に↑終↑↓お↓わった。
↑我々↑↓われわれ↓は|↑正午|↑↓しょうご↓に↑東京↑↓とうきょう↓↑駅↑↓えき↓に↑着↑↓つ↓くだろう。
sdata.e: We will get to Tokyo Station at noon.

sdata.e: We had hoped that the rain would stop before noon.
